forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 58. West southwest wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Labor Day
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 72, with temperatures falling to around 70 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 8 to 17 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight descends upon Downtown San Francisco, the air carries a gentle warmth, tinged with coastal breezes that whisper of the Pacific. Clear skies, unfurling in shades of deepening twilight, cast a serene ambience, promising a comfortable evening ahead, with temperatures settling around a gentle 58 degrees. The westerly winds, playful yet mild, offer a welcome touch as they weave through the streets, urging you to embrace the evening with a light jacket or a cozy sweater.

Looking toward Labor Day, the promise of a sunny morrow invites the spirit outdoors. Send your thoughts drifting to sunlit adventures with highs nearing 72, where the warmth will remind you of late summer’s embrace. The familiarity of the sun-laced air suggests a day perfect for a stroll through your favorite park or perhaps a leisurely bike ride along the waterfront. The misty marine layer, lurking nearby but momentarily absent, may make an appearance come afternoon, adding a soft, nostalgic edge to the skyline. Yet for now, the horizon remains brightly inviting, a canvas for mundane joys—sharing a quiet coffee on a patio or exploring hidden side streets, all under the spell of a serene San Francisco evening.
